name: Let's Do Alien Taxes!
description:
made by Ryan R Burns in 72h for Ludum Dare 50

How To Play: Use the documents on the left, to fill out your taxes on the right. Then SIGN! Easy! (Except some documents are in alien languages and you have to fill it precisely or go to Space Jail.) 

** There is a 'Full Screen' button in the bottom right, this will help with any small text. **

LET'S DO ALIEN TAXES!

File with the Intergalactic Revenue Service (IRS). Don't make a mistake or they will put you in SPACE JAIL (Not really, I didn't implement that.)

Sort Documents!

Fill Forms!

This game has it all! 
Forms. Taxes. Music. Buttons. Toggles. More Forms. A photo of a handsome alien.

By popular request, we removed...
Options! Title Menu! Pause! Fun! Any meaningful interaction! Levels!
All that remains in the pure tax-y goodness.
